sn35.144:1.2: The cause and reason that gives rise to sights is also suffering.
sn35.144:1.3: Since sights are produced by what is suffering, how could they be happiness?
sn35.144:1.9: The cause and reason that gives rise to ideas is also suffering.
sn35.144:1.10: Since ideas are produced by what is suffering, how could they be happiness?
sn35.144:1.12: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
